Key Match Events: J. Sarmiento scored the opening goal for Ecuador
Jhonder Cadiz scored the equalizer for Venezuela
Eduard Bello scored the winning goal for Venezuela
Post-Match Reflections: Ecuador have not won their opening game at a Copa America since 1993
Venezuela have just their ninth win in 71 matches at Copa America all-time
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is just the third time that Venezuela have begun the tournament with a victory, having also done so in 2015 and 2016
Others: Enner Valencia was sent off for an ugly lunge on Venezuela defender Jose Martinez
Jeremy Sarmiento, who spent this season on loan at Ipswich Town from Brighton & Hove Albion, scored the opening goal for Ecuador
Salomon Rondon assisted the leveler for Venezuela
